artist: Kawamura Bunpō; Ganku; Matsumura Goshun; Matsumura Keibun; Nagasawa Rosetsu; Shibata Gitō; Utagawa Toyohiro; Yamaguchi Soken
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and color on silk
text: This collaborative painting is a remarkable Who's Who among artists of the Maruyama-Shijo School in the late eighteenth century. Each artist has supplied a self-portrait in the guise of a Chinese scholar. Together, they are shown admiring antique objects and paintings, reflecting their romantic concept of the lives of Chinese officials.
title: Gathering of Artists
